mapper.insert: insert into MEMBER_TB ( seq, id, password, name, pnumber, birth, email, regdate) values( SEQ_MEMBER.NEXTVAL , #{id}, #{password}, #{name}, #{pnumber}, #{birth}, #{email}, sysdate)
mapper.update: update MEMBER_TB set password = #{password}, name = #{name}, pnumber = #{pnumber}, birth = #{birth}, email = #{email} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select count(id) count from member where id = #{id}
